alert.note: Alert for Sweetwater (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 1:38PM MDT until June 23 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sweetwater County in south central Wyoming... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 137 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Seedskadee National Wildlife Refuge, which is also 12 miles northeast of Granger, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. A funnel cloud or brief tornado is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. The public has also reported a brief tornado. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Sweetwater County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
